moratuwa pa්radeshaye sthanagatha wi athi gruha bhanda nishpadana karmantha sandaha amudrawya lesa dawa sapayima wenuwata ihala gunathmaka bhawayen yuth gruha bhanda nishpadanaya kirima ema wyapruthiye mulika aramuna we.gruha bhanda nishpadanaya sandaha nawina thakshanaya handunwa dima, dawa bhandawala gunathmaka bhawaya wadi diyunu kirima saha nishpadana ki්rayawaliye di siduwana nasthiya awama kirima da me yatathe apeksha kere.akkara 35 ka bhumi pa්ramanayaka idiwena buththala karmanthapuraye da dahasaka pamana pirisakata rakiya apekshitha athara 2009 wasare pebarawari masaya wana wita ema idikirim katayuthu nima we.buththala karmanthapuraye sarthakathwaya matha bibile da dawa aashi්ratha karmanthapurayak idi kirimata niyamithaya.

lenin ”rajaya ha wiplawaya”hi penwa dena paridi, maksge wiwechanayanhi nirawadyathawaya jarmanu espingi nayakathwaya wisin rupika lesa piliganna lada namudu ee bawa nothaka, 1886 di paksha nayaka oogast bebel “ape aramunu” mayen 1872 di nikuth kala, pahatha dakwena pataya athulath wana siya pusthikawa kisidu wenasakin thorawa yali pala kaleya: “thawada ee anuwa rajyaya, panthi palanaya matha padanam wuwaka sita janatha rajyayak bawata pariwarthanaya kere.”

eyata amatharawa rinawun-niwyangs ha don bosko-rathnam athara tharaga ardha awasan purwa watayedi pawathwe.jathika kandayame kridakayan kihipadeneku ha 22n pahala jathika kandayame kridakayan wadipirisak sitina nawika-guwan kandayam athara tharagaya boho denekuge awadhanayata lakwa athi tharagayaki.nawika hamudawa nimawu champiyan lig papandu tharagawaliye champiyan of champiyan tharagayedi prabala rathnam pila gola 4-1k lesa parada sitina athara lig tharagawaliye siwuwani sthanaya dina gaththeya.guwan hamuda pile puhunukaru lesa katayuthu kala wathman jathika papandu puhunukaru sampath perera yatathe boho kalak puhunuwimen lada aabhashayen guwan hamuda kridakayan me tharagayedi peraliyak kirimata kalpana karamin siti.
